SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.network.socket

Class SocketServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.network.socket.SocketServer
public class SocketServer extends Object
Class representing the GamesManager server used in socket based communication, this class manages the ServerSocket. When a new connection with a client is created, a new SocketClientHandler is associated with the Socket used for the communication with the client.
